definitions.text: a step in walking or running
the grooved surface of a pneumatic tire
the part (as of a wheel or shoe) that makes contact with the ground
structural member consisting of the horizontal part of a stair or step
put down or press the foot, place the foot
examples: For fools rush in where angels fear to tread

definitions.text: tread or stomp heavily or roughly
examples: The soldiers trampled across the fields

definitions.text: crush as if by treading on
brace (an archer's bow) by pressing the foot against the center
